metadata.title: CVE-2011-5325 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the BusyBox implementation of tar before 1.22.0 v5 allows remote attackers to point to files outside the current working directory via a symlink.

notes.note: mdeslaur> bionic only contains first commit adding the second commit to bionic introduced a regression in debootstrep, see LP: #1737662 new third commit mostly reverses second commit two new commits are now available that possibly fix further symlink issues

criterions.comment: busybox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3').
